original_text: Jesus said to them, ‘Yes, that is true. You will have pain and trouble like mine. But I cannot promise that you will sit at my right side or at my left side. My Father God has chosen the people who will sit there. He has prepared the places for those people.’
korean_text: 이르시되 너희가 과연 내 잔을 마시려니와 내 좌우편에 앉는 것은 내가 주는 것이 아니라 내 아버지께서 누구를 위하여 예비하셨든지 그들이 얻을 것이니라

sentences.original_text: You will have pain and trouble like mine
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 나와 같은 고통과 어려움을 겪을 것이다

sentences.original_text: that you will sit at my right side or at my left side
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 내 오른편이나 왼편에 앉을 것이라는 것을

sentences.original_text: My Father God has chosen the people
sentences.korean_translation: 나의 아버지 하나님께서 그 사람들을 선택하셨다
